text:
@Jim_Jordan Why did Mitch McConnell blocked Sen. Chris Van Hollen to provide $250 billion more into a loan program for small businesses devastated by the coronavirus pandemic?

If McConnell was REALLY interested in helping out Small Businesses in America HE WOULD HAVE AGREED TO THE AMENDMENT
